# ConsoleBufferCell.WithForeground method

Generate a new cell with a different foreground color, but the same character and background as the current cell.

```csharp
public ConsoleBufferCell WithForeground(AnsiColor color)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| color | New foreground of the returned cell. |

## Return Value

New ConsoleBufferCell.
